name: Cool Steel
bonus: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Cryo by 12/15/18/21/24%.

name: Dark Iron Sword
bonus: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, or an Electro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 20/25/30/35/40% for 12s.
location: Talk to Chen the Sharp near the Liyue Harbor

name: Fillet Blade
bonus: On hit, has 50% chance to deal 240/280/320/360/400% ATK DMG to a single enemy. Can only occur once every 15/14/13/12/11s.

name: Alley Hunter
bonus: Every 4s a character is on the field, their ATK increases by 4/5/6/7/8% and their CRIT DMG increases by 4/5/6/7/8%. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be cleared when the character takes DMG.

name: Amber Catalyst
bonus: Normal Attack hits increase all Elemental DMG by 6/7.5/9/10.5/12% for 6s. Max 2 stacks.

name: Amos' Bow
bonus: Increases Normal Attack and Aimed Shot DMG by 12/15/18/21/24%. Increases DMG from arrows shot by a further 8/10/12/14/16% for every 0.1s that the arrow is in flight, up to 0.5s. Stacks up to 5 times on each arrow.

name: Aquila Favonia
bonus: ATK is increased by 20/25/30/35/40%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of the resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to 100/115/130/145/160% of ATK and dealing 200/230/260/290/320% of ATK as DMG to surrounding enemies. This effect can only occur once every 15s.

name: Black Tassel
bonus: Increases DMG against slimes by 40/50/60/70/80%.

name: Blackcliff Agate
bonus: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 12/15/18/21/24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

name: Blackcliff Longsword
bonus: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 12/15/18/21/24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

name: Blackcliff Pole
bonus: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 12/15/18/21/24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

name: Blackcliff Slasher
bonus: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 12/15/18/21/24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

name: Blackcliff Warbow
bonus: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 12/15/18/21/24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

name: Bloodtainted Greatsword
bonus: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 12/15/18/21/24%.

name: Compound Bow
bonus: Normal Attack and Aimed Shot hits increase ATK by 4/5/6/7/8% and Normal Attack SPD by 1.2/1.5/1.8/2.1/2.4% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

name: Crescent Pike
bonus: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal an additional 20% ATK as DMG for 5s.

name: Deathmatch
bonus: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by 16% and DEF is increased by 16%. If there are less than 2 enemies nearby, ATK is increased by 24%.

name: Debate Club
bonus: After using an Elemental Skill, Normal or Charged Attacks, on hit, deal an additional 60/75/90/105/120% ATK DMG in a small area. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.

name: Dragon's Bane
bonus: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Pyro by 20/24/28/32/36%.

name: Ebony Bow
bonus: Increases DMG against mechanoid Ruin enemies by 40/50/60/70/80%.

name: Emerald Orb
bonus: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 20/25/30/35/40% for 12s.

name: Eye of Perception
bonus: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing 240/270/300/330/360% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between enemies a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every 12/11/10/9/8s.

name: Favonius Codex
bonus: CRIT hits have a 60/70/80/90/100% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12/10.5/9/7.5/6s.

name: Favonius Greatsword
bonus: CRIT hits have a 60/70/80/90/100% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12/10.5/9/7.5/6s.

name: Favonius Lance
bonus: CRIT hits have a 60/70/80/90/100% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12/10.5/9/7.5/6s.

name: Favonius Sword
bonus: CRIT hits have a 60/70/80/90/100% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12/10.5/9/7.5/6s.

name: Favonius Warbow
bonus: CRIT hits have a 60/70/80/90/100% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12/10.5/9/7.5/6s.

name: Ferrous Shadow
bonus: When HP falls below 70/75/80/85/90%, increases Charged Attack DMG by 30/35/40/45/50%, and Charged Attacks become much harder to interrupt.

name: Halberd
bonus: Normal Attacks deal an additional 160/200/240/280/320% DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

name: Harbinger of Dawn
bonus: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by 14/18/22/24/28%.

name: Iron Sting
bonus: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 6% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.

name: Kunwu's Iris Rift
bonus: Normal Attack hits have a 20% chance of causing the next Charged Attack performed in the following 10s to deal 40% increased DMG.

name: Lion's Roar
bonus: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 20/24/28/32/36%.

name: Lithic Blade
bonus: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains 6/7/8/9/10% ATK increase and 2/3/4/5/6% CRIT Rate increase.

name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
bonus: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, earn a 6/8/10/12/14% Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.

name: Magic Guide
bonus: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 12/15/18/21/24%.

name: Mappa Mare
bonus: Triggering an Elemental reaction grants a 8/10/12/14/16% Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s. Max 2 stacks.

name: Memory of Dust
bonus: Increase Shield Strength by 20/25/30/35/40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4/5/6/7/8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

name: Messenger
location: Aimed Shot hits on weak spots deal an additional 100/125/150/175/200% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

name: Otherworldly Story
bonus: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2% HP.

name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
bonus: On hit, increases ATK by 3.2/3.9/4.6/5.3/6% for 6s. Max 7 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. Full stacks increase Skill DMG by 12/16/20/24/28%.

name: Prototype Aminus
bonus: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional 240/300/360/420/480% ATK DMG to enemies within a small radius. Can only occur once every 15s.

name: Prototype Crescent
bonus: Aimed Shot hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by 6% for 10s.

name: Prototype Starglitter
bonus: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 8% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

name: Prototype Amber
bonus: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 4/4.5/5/5.5/6 Energy every 2s for 6s. Additionally, all party members will regenerate 4/4.5/5/5.5/6% HP every 2s for this duration.

name: Prototype Rancour
bonus: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 4/4.5/5/5.5/6% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

name: Quartz
bonus: Upon causing an Overloaded, Melt, Burning, Vaporize, or a Pyro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 20/25/30/35/40% for 12s.

name: Rainslasher
bonus: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 20/25/30/35/40%.

name: Raven Bow
bonus: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Pyro by 12/15/18/21/24%.

name: Recurve Bow
bonus: Defeating an opponent restores 8/10/12/14/16% HP.

name: Royal Bow
bonus: Upon damaging an enemy, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all stacks.

name: Royal Greatsword
bonus: Upon damaging an enemy, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all stacks.

name: Royal Grimoire
bonus: Upon damaging an enemy, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all stacks.

name: Royal Longsword
bonus: Upon damaging an enemy, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all stacks.

name: Royal Spear
bonus: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all stacks.

name: Rust
bonus: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 40/50/60/70/80% but decreases Aimed Shot DMG by 8/9/10/11/12%

name: Sacrificial Bow
bonus: Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40/50/60/70/80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30/26/22/18/14s.

name: Sacrificial Fragments
bonus: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40/50/60/70/80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30/26/22/18/14s.

name: Sacrificial Greatsword
bonus: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40/50/60/70/80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30/26/22/18/14s.

name: Sacrificial Sword
bonus: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40/50/60/70/80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30/26/22/18/14s.

name: Serpent Spine
bonus: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal 6% more DMG and take 3% more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be cleared when the character takes DMG.

name: Sharpshooter's Oath
bonus: Increases DMG against weak spots by 24/30/36/42/48%.

name: Skyrider Greatsword
bonus: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by 6/7/8/9/10% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.5s.

name: Skyrider Sword
bonus: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 12/15/18/21/24% increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 12s.

name: Skyward Atlas
bonus: Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by 12/15/18/21/24%. Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds. which actively seek out nearby enemies to attack for 15s, dealing 160/200/240/280/320% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 30s.

name: Skyward Blade
bonus:
CRIT Rate increased by 4%. Gains Skypiercing Might upon using an Elemental Burst:
Increases Movement SPD by 10%, increases ATK SPD by 10%, and increases the DMG of Normal and Charged Attack hits by 20% for 12s.

name: Skyward Harp
bonus: Increases CRIT DMG by 20/25/30/35/40%. Hits have a 60/70/80/90/100% chance to inflict a small AoE attack, dealing 100% Physical ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 4s.

name: Skyward Pride
bonus: Increases all DMG by 8/10/12/14/16%. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does 80/100/120/140/160% Physical DMG to enemies along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

name: Skyward Spine
bonus: Increases CRIT Rate by 8% and increases Normal ATK SPD by 12%. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on enemies have a 50% chance to trigger a vacuum blade that deals 40% of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.

name: Slingshot
bonus: If a Normal Attack or Aimed Shot hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 36/42/48/54/60%; otherwise, it decreases DMG by 10%.

name: Solar Pearl
bonus: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 20/25/30/35/40% for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by 20/25/30/35/40% for 6s.

name: The Alley Flash
bonus: Continuosly sprinting for at least 1s increases ATK by 28% for 6s. This effect cannot stack.

name: The Bell
bonus: Taking DMG generates a shield which absorbs DMG up to 20/23/26/29/32% of Max HP. This shield lasts for 10s or until broken, and can only be triggered once every 45s. While protected by the shield, the character gains 12/15/18/21/24% increased DMG.

name: The Black Sword
bonus:
Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by 20%.
Additionally, regenerates 60% of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.

name: The Flute
bonus: Normal or Charged Attacks grant Harmonic on hits. Gaining 5 Harmonics triggers the power of music and deals 100/125/150/175/200% ATK DMG to surrounding enemies. Harmonics last up to 30s, and a maximum of 1 can be gained every 0.5s.

name: The Stringless
bonus: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 24/30/36/42/48%.

name: The Unforged
bonus: Increases Shield Strength by 20/25/30/35/40%, scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4/5/6/7/8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%

name: The Viridescent Hunt
bonus: Upon hit, Normal and Aimed Shot Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding enemies, dealing 40% of ATK as DMG to these enemies every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every 14s.

name: The Widsith
bonus:
When the character takes the field, they gain a random theme song for 10s:
Recitative: Increases Base ATK by 60%
Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by 240
Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by 48%
Can only occur once every 30s

name: Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers
bonus: When switching characters, the new character taking the field has their ATK increased by 24/30/36/42/48% for 10s. This effect can only occur once every 20s.

name: Traveler's Handy Sword
bonus: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2% HP.

name: Twin Nephrite
bonus: Defeating an enemy increases Movement SPD and ATK by 12/14/16/18/20% for 15s.

name: Vortex Vanquisher
bonus: Increases Shield Strength by 20/25/30/35/40%, scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4/5/6/7/8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%

name: White Iron Greatsword
bonus: Defeating an opponent restores 8/10/12/14/16% HP.

name: White Tassel
bonus: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 24/30/36/42/48%.

name: Whiteblind
bonus: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 6/7.5/9/10.5/12% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.5s.

name: Wine and Song
bonus: For every character in the party who hails from Mondstadt, the character who equips this weapon gains 8/10/12/14/16% ATK increase and 3/3.5/4/4.5/5% Movement SPD increase.

name: Wolf's Gravestone
bonus: Increases Base ATK by 20/25/30/35/40%. On hit, attacks against enemies with less than 30% HP increase all party members' Base ATK by 40/50/60/70/80% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

name: Summit Shaper
bonus: Increases Shield Strength by 20%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

name: Festering Desire
bonus: Incrases Elemental Skill DMG by 16% and Elemental Skill CRIT Rata be 6%.

name: Snow-Tombed Starsilver
bonus: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing 80% AoE ATK DMG. Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt 200% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

name: Dragonspine Spear
bonus: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing 80% AoE ATK DMG. Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt 200% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

name: Frostbearer
bonus: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60/70/80/90/100% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing 80/95/110/125/140% AoE ATK DMG. Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt 200/240/280/320/360% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

name: Primordial Jade Cutter
bonus: HP increased by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on 1.2%/1.5%/1.8%/2.1%/2.4% of the wielder's Max HP.

name: Staff of Homa
bonus: HP increased by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on 0.8%/1%/1.2%/1.4%/1.6% of the wielder's Max HP. When the wielder's HP is less than 50%, this ATK Bonus is increased by an additional 1%/1.2%/1.4%/1.6%/1.8% of Max HP.

name: Lithic Spear
bonus: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a 7%/8%/9%/10%/11% ATK increase and a 3%/4%/5%/6%/7% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times

name: Lithic Blade
bonus: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a 7%/8%/9%/10%/11% ATK increase and a 3%/4%/5%/6%/7% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times

name: Sword of Descension
bonus: Hitting opponents with Normal and Charged Attacks grants a 50% chance to deal 200% ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can only occur once every 10s. Additionally, if the Traveler equips the Sword of Descension, their ATK is increased by 66.

name: Freedom-Sworn **(unreleased)**
bonus: A part of the 'Millennial Movement' that wanders amidst the winds. Increases DMG by 10%. When the character wielding this weapon triggers Elemental Reactions, they gain a Sigil of Rebellion. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s and can be triggered even if said character is not on the field. When you possess 2 Sigils of Rebellion, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain 'Millennial Movement: Song of Resistance' for 12s. 'Millennial Movement: Song of Resistance' increases Normal, Charged and Plunging Attack DMG by 16% and increases ATK by 20%. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Rebellion for 20s. Of the many effects of the 'Millennial Movement', buffs of the same type will not stack.

name: Song of Broken Pines
bonus: A part of the 'Millennial Movement' that wanders amidst the winds. Increases ATK by 16%, and when Normal or Charged Attacks hit opponents, the character gains a Sigil of Whispers. This effect can be triggered once every 0.3s. When you possess 4 Sigils of Whispers, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain the 'Millennial Movement: Banner-Hymn' effect for 12s. 'Millennial Movement: Banner-Hymn' increases Normal ATK SPD by 12% and increases ATK by 20%. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Whispers for 20s. Of the many effects of the 'Millennial Movement', buffs of the same type will not stack.

name: Windblume Ode
bonus: After using an Elemental Skill, receive a boon from the ancient wish of the Windblume, increasing ATK by 16% for 6s.

name: Elegy for the End
bonus: A part of the 'Millennial Movement' that wanders amidst the winds. Increases Elemental Mastery by 60. When the Elemental Skills or Elemental Bursts of the character wielding this weapon hit opponents, that character gains a Sigil of Remembrance. This effect can be triggered once every 0.2s and can be triggered even if said character is not on the field. When you possess 4 Sigils of Remembrance, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain the 'Millennial Movement: Farewell Song' effect for 12s. 'Millennial Movement: Farewell Song' increases Elemental Mastery by 100 and increases ATK by 20%. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Remembrance for 20s. Of the many effects of the 'Millennial Movement', buffs of the same type will not stack.

name: Dodoco Tales **(unreleased)**
bonus: Normal Attack hits on opponents increase Charged Attack DMG by 16% for 6s. Charged Attack hits on opponents increase ATK by 8% for 6s.

name: Mitternachts Waltz **(unreleased)**
bonus: Normal Attack hits on opponents increase Elemental Skill DMG by 20% for 5s. Elemental Skill hits on opponents increase Normal Attack DMG by 20% for 5s.
